x10.util.resilient.localstore

Class ResilientStore

  • x10.util.resilient.localstore.ResilientStore

  • public class ResilientStore
    A store that maintains a master + 1 backup (slave) copy of the data. The mapping between masters and slaves is specififed by the next/prev operations on the activePlaces PlaceGroup.
